alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Harris; Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 08 at 4:01PM CST until January 08 at 4:30PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chambers County in southeastern Texas... South central Liberty County in southeastern Texas... East central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 430 PM CST. * At 400 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crosby, or 7 miles northeast of Barrett, moving north at 25 to 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Liberty and Dayton. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
